text: Afracantha is a genus of African orb-weaver spiders containing the single species, Afracantha camerunensis. It was first described by Friedrich Dahl in 1914, and has only been found in Africa. ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of Africa Category:Spiders of South America Category:Taxa named by Friedrich Dahl
title: Afracantha
